def hasconsecutivedigits(n):
	# your code goes here
	
    n = abs(n)
    prevDigit = -1
    while (n > 0):
        onesDigit = n%10
        n //= 10
        if (prevDigit == onesDigit):
            return True
        prevDigit = onesDigit
    return False
